sentences.en: Hesitation encourages the adversary to persevere, may be even to raise the ante.
sentences.cn: 犹豫不决只会鼓励敌人顽固坚持, 甚至下新的赌注.

sentences.en: It can be tricky at first, but persevere.
sentences.cn: 一开始会有些棘手，不过要坚持。

sentences.en: It is strength of character enabled him to persevere.
sentences.cn: 他那坚强的性格使他能够坚持不懈.

sentences.en: It took a generous helping of entrepreneurial confidence to persevere during this incident.
sentences.cn: 在这一事件中坚持下来是有了充足的创业信心的。

sentences.en: It was plain that the island would persevere to the end.
sentences.cn: 这个岛国显然要坚持到底.

sentences.en: It's difficult, but I'm going to persevere with it.
sentences.cn: 难是难, 但我一定坚持到底.

sentences.en: Our task is hard; however we should persevere to the end.
sentences.cn: 我们的工作是艰苦的, 但我们应当坚持到底.
只要你坚持不懈,你自会成功.

sentences.en: The cadres of our commune persevere in participation in collective productive labour.
sentences.cn: 我们公社的干部坚持参加集体生产劳动.

sentences.en: The cold weather will persevere for the whole week.
sentences.cn: 寒冷的天气将持续整整一周.

sentences.en: They are determined to persevere in the fight.
We must persevere in the arduous work.
sentences.cn: 我们一定要坚持这项艰苦的工作.

sentences.en: We will be successful as long as we persevere.
sentences.cn: 只要我们坚持不懈,就会成功.

sentences.en: What about goals? Yes I need goals to persevere in life.
sentences.cn: 关于目标 呢 ?是的,在生活里,我需要坚持一些目标.

sentences.en: You will succeed in so far as you persevere.
sentences.cn: 你能坚持,便会得到相对的成功.

sentences.en: You'll need to persevere if you want the business to succeed.
sentences.cn: 要想事业成功,就得持之以.

words.tran_cn: 固执的，坚持的；持久稳固的
持续言语（指言语反复不止的病态）；持续重复的行为；执拗
患持续言语症；表现固执

trans.tran_en: to continue trying to do something in a very determined way in spite of difficulties – use this to show approval

trans.tran_cn: 坚忍，熬住，坚持，百折不回，不屈不挠，支撑
